channel.title: A Few Minor Questions
channel.description:
1)
--
What is the xxxx number for the text which shows Quest points? c.sendFrame126("", xxxx);
2)
--
Can someone give me a simple Teleport to Home command, but which uses the first emotion button please.
Thank you, and i'll gladly appreciate it, if you can answer these questions.
Thank you -Vendetta

item.title: A Few Minor Questions
item.dc:creator: @Vendetta_LG Vendetta_LG
item.description:
@Vendetta_LG wrote:

Gives me errors D:

Read full topic

item.title: A Few Minor Questions
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

I’ll get back on the SendQuest ID.
As for the emote button teleport, -

In TextHandler.java, add this.

        p.sendFrame126("@whi@Home!", 180);

Then in Client.java, add your command.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = 2792; teleportToY = 4822; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }

Read full topic
